action.label: &Export Feeds...
action.tooltip: Export Feeds to an OPML source

action.label: &Import Feeds...
action.tooltip: Import Feeds from an OPML source

command.description: Reloads the current active View or Editor.
command.name: Update

command.description: Mark all News of the currently displayed Feed as Read
command.name: Mark All Read

command.description: Toggle Read State of selected News
command.name: Toggle Read State

command.description: Aggregate all feeds of the selected folder.
command.name: Aggregate Feeds

property.name: aboutText
property.value:
RSSOwl 2.0

scheme.description: This is the RSSOwl Keys Scheme
scheme.name: RSSOwl Keys

context.description: This context is reserved for navigation between Feeds and News in RSSOwl.
context.name: RSSOwl Navigation

fontDefinition.label: News Text Font
fontDefinition.description: The news text font is used to display the contents of a news.

fontDefinition.label: Headlines Font
fontDefinition.description: The headlines font is used to display the headlines of a feed.

fontDefinition.label: Bookmark Explorer Font
fontDefinition.description: The bookmark explorer font is used in the bookmark explorer to display all folders, bookmarks and saved searches.

colorDefinition.label: Sticky News Background
colorDefinition.description: The sticky news background color is used as background color for all sticky news including the bookmark that the news is belonging to.

fontDefinition.label: Notification Popup Font
fontDefinition.description: The notification popup font is used in the notification when news are coming in.
